modName: Zun se dinok- weapon of death
summary: This is the first mod i've ever released onto nexus, this mod contains my own personal weapon i use in skyrim, made by me.
descriptionHtml:
This blade is my own personal weapon on skyrim, a 2h ancient nord sword (and dont worry,i retexured it to make it look unique.) named Zun se dinok, dragon language for "weapon of death."

you can find it at ustengrav in a chest in front of the word wall for the first word of the ethereal form shout, guarded by a frost atronach.

the weapon does frost and slowing damage, asborbs 10 health and drains magicka completely, also does dragon damage and does soul trap for 3 minutes
any other stats besides that...the blade itself does 37 damage, but thats only the original dmg, so if thats not enough for you or your a high level player, you can always upgrade it. PLEASE DONT FORGET TO COMMENT. p.s - i might make it have a little story to it.
author: cryoknight 1
